userIdentifiers.title: Empty string means the user does not exist in the namespace

partnerId.title: The partner id the users belong to

accountId.title: The account identifier the users are associated with

pagingOptions.title: The paging options to use for the request

namespaces.title: The namespaces that the users with the given email address are in

namespaceId.description: namespace_id is the namespace string, like a partner ID "ABC" or and an account group "AG-B5QCG7MXXN".

namespaceType.description: namespace_type is the type of namespace, like PARTNER or ACCOUNT_GROUP.

userId.title: The user identifiers the account is associated with

paths.description: The set of field mask paths.

vendastatypesFieldMask.title: `FieldMask` represents a set of symbolic field paths, for example:

cursor.title: cursor can be passed to retrieve the next page of results keyed by the cursor

pageSize.title: page_size specifies the number of items to return in the next page

nextCursor.title: A cursor that can be provided to retrieve the next page of results

hasMore.title: Whether or not more results exist

totalResults.title: The total number of results. This is not supported on all paged apis and will be 0 if it is not supported
